column12: Bicycle helmet, has fastening band provided for attaching helmet with head of user, helmet supporting part formed from plastic and chin strap provided with clip-connector, which is provided for actuating with combination lock
column13: The bicycle helmet (1) has a helmet supporting part (2) provided inside for wearing with a helmet pad. A fastening band (3) is provided for attaching the helmet with head of the user. A chin strap (4) is provided with a clip-connector (6). The clip-connector is provided for actuating with a combination lock (5). The clip-connector along with the combination lock is shielded with a hinged protection cover. Wire ropes or carbon reinforcements are included in the fastening band. The helmet supporting part is formed from plastic.
